scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp public/icon.png dist/
scripts.copy-assets:firefox: cp manifest-firefox.json dist/manifest.json && cp public/icon.png dist/ && cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.js dist/browser-polyfill.js
scripts.firefox:dev: npm run build:firefox && npm run firefox:run
scripts.lint:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext lint --source-dir dist
